full_text:
Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
From
To Lee Plourde
Date 2019/08/11 12:53
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822

Hi, I know you are busy. Following up on this. Also wondering about a few details I see out there:

was this already known? In addition, the jail had transferred his cellmate and allowed Mr. Epstein to be housed alone in a cell just two weeks after he had been taken off suicide watch, a decision that also violated the jail’s normal procedure, two officials said.

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257 (b)(6)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:17:52 PM
To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Thanks, Lee.
1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch?
2. How long was he on suicide watch?
3. What unit in the jail was he housed?
4. Was he by himself?
5. What’s protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period?
6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing investigation?
7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show?
8. What did he use to hang himself?

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257 (b)(6)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

From: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov>
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10:00 PM
To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon,

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing Jeffrey Epstein's death in jail. The emails are between a Senior Editor of The Daily Beast and Lee Plourde from BOP. The document contains redacted information.
